General.Name: Suzhou Maxwell Technologies Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Suzhou Maxwell Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the design, research and development, production, and sale of solar cell production equipment in China. The company offers solar cell screen printing equipment, PECVD vacuum coating equipment, HJT solar cell PVD vacuum coating equipment, automatic solar cell screen printing machine, automatic loading machine, infrared drying oven, and test sorting machine, as well as film laser cutting equipment, solar cell manufacturing turn-key solution, laser stealth cutting equipment, mini/micro LED wafer equipment, and semiconductor wafer equipment. Its products are used in midstream cell production links of the photovoltaic industry chain. In addition, the company engages in the development and sale of software; technology development, transfer, consulting, etc.; research and development, production, and sale of vacuum coating equipment; sale of mechanical equipment; programming development; and production and sales of machinery and equipment. Further, it is involved in self-management and agency of import and export of various commodities and technologies. Suzhou Maxwell Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Qiong  Liu
1.Title: CFO, Director, Financial Controller and Board Sec.
